agents.name: James Thorne
agents.goal_summary: Maintain status and order; keep the evening smooth; stay loyal.

agents.name: Elena Thorne
agents.goal_summary: Protect secrecy and safety; avoid confrontation; seek autonomy.

agents.name: Marcus Webb
agents.goal_summary: Maximize secrecy and safety; deflect suspicion; control the narrative.

agents.name: Lydia Cross
agents.goal_summary: Seek truth while staying safe; protect Thorne without triggering conflict.

agents.name: Diana Forrest
agents.goal_summary: Balance loyalties; keep secrets contained; avoid financial collapse.

agents.name: Victor Hale
agents.goal_summary: Pursue the truth about Marcus; probe for evidence; tolerate social discomfort.

locations.name: Dining Table
locations.description: The main dining table. Seats six. The social center of the evening — everyone can see and hear everything here.

locations.name: Kitchen
locations.description: An open-plan kitchen adjacent to the dining area. Semi-private — you can slip away under the pretense of getting more wine, but the dining table is within earshot.

locations.name: Balcony
locations.description: A small balcony off the dining room. Private enough for real conversations. Stepping outside signals you want a moment — or a confrontation away from the group.

locations.name: Foyer
locations.description: The entrance hallway. People pass through here to arrive, leave, or make phone calls. Semi-public — you can catch snippets from the dining room.

locations.name: Bathroom
locations.description: A small bathroom down the hall from the dining room. The most private space available. Ideal for intense private conversations — or hiding.

secrets.description: Elena and Marcus are having a romantic affair behind Thorne's back.
secrets.reveal_consequences: Thorne's marriage and business partnership are both destroyed. The social fabric of the evening tears apart.

secrets.description: Marcus has been embezzling money from the business he shares with Thorne.
secrets.reveal_consequences: Marcus faces criminal charges. Thorne realizes his business partner betrayed him twice. Victor gets his story.

secrets.description: Diana owes Marcus a large sum of money, making her financially dependent on him.
secrets.reveal_consequences: Diana's loyalty conflict becomes public. Elena realizes Diana might not be a trustworthy confidante. Marcus has leverage.

secrets.description: Lydia has noticed financial discrepancies in the firm's books and suspects Marcus of wrongdoing.
secrets.reveal_consequences: If Marcus learns Lydia suspects him, she becomes a threat he needs to neutralize. If Thorne learns, he has an ally.

secrets.description: Victor is secretly investigating Marcus's business dealings for a journalistic expose.
secrets.reveal_consequences: If Marcus confirms Victor is investigating, he'll try to buy Victor off, discredit him, or flee. If Thorne learns, Victor becomes an ally or a threat.

events.description: Thorne welcomes the guests and proposes a toast.
Lydia notices Marcus checking his phone nervously under the table.
Elena excuses herself to check on dessert.
Elena whispers that she fears Thorne suspects something.
Lydia overhears Elena and Marcus whispering in the kitchen.
Elena confides to Diana about the affair, voice shaking.
Diana realizes her debt to Marcus traps her no matter what happens tonight.
Victor gets a text from an unknown number: 'Don't trust Marcus.'
Marcus deflects Thorne's quiet question about the firm's finances.
Victor and Lydia trade careful small talk that edges toward money.
Elena overcompensates with tenderness toward Thorne; Marcus watches.
Victor notices hints of a discrepancy in the numbers Marcus just quoted.
Thorne steps out to the balcony to get air, jaw tight.
Victor asks a pointed question about the firm's accounts.
Marcus follows Thorne to the balcony.
Thorne confronts Marcus about the ledger, voice low and dangerous.
Lydia finally tells Thorne what she overheard between Elena and Marcus.
Marcus jokes too loudly as if nothing is wrong; his hands shake.
Elena sees Lydia on the balcony with Thorne and panics.
Marcus tries to publicly deny everything with a practiced smile.
Elena breaks down and confesses the affair with Marcus.
events.dialogue: "I can't do this anymore. Marcus and I... it's true."

events.description: Thorne turns on Marcus. The betrayal is now double.
Thorne storms toward the front door.
Diana realizes she's free of Marcus's leverage now that everything is out.
Victor quietly asks Lydia if she'll go on record when she's ready.
